review: I bought this Roku streaming stick and was pleased until about 15 minutes into the first use of it.  The stick works fine, but the remote just stops after a few minutes of use.  I had to remove and replace the batteries, and that was good for another five minutes of use.  Bought new batteries.  Same issue.  Called Roku tech support, and they offered to sell me another remote with a warranty and more tech support for $19.95.  That wasn't happening!  When they couldn't resolve the problem (after an hour of going through their scripts) from India, they suggested I contact the seller.  Amazon was so helpful and sent a replacement within two days.  Dang if the replacement didn't have the same problem!  The remotes on these things just don't work!  Roku tech support can't help.  Don't buy it.  I'm going back to my older Roku, which has never had a problem.
author: Amazon Customer

review: We own two AppleTVs, Two Amazon TVs and an Amazon Firestick. Was interested in Roku due to large selection of channels available. Set up has been a nightmare. Roku website (which is required for registration) crashed multiple times while trying to register. The site only continued on when I used a Paypal account instead of a credit card for registration.  Once I selected my channels the Roku froze. Nothing will unfreeze it. Multiple resets attempts have not worked. Now the website will not work. Three hours into installation and am stuck. Setup for Apple and Amazon TV products was smooth. Shipping this back. Very disappointed.
